channel.title: Client run file always crashes? Help Please!
channel.description:
Hi! So i've been experiencing alot of trouble lately with ANY 317/474 client i try to run. Ever client i try to run, i always get a error that somewhat reads: Error: Could not find or load main class *****. I have over 4 client files that i downloaded, trying to figure out why they wont run.. And i get the same answer for all of them. All of the run.bat files have this in them:
@echo off title Client "C:\Program Files\Java\jdk1.7.0_25\bin\java.exe" -Xmx750m client 30 0 lowmem members 32 pause
But with with different errors.. This is so hard to explain... So the client with the run that has "Xmx750m client" in it. I get an error where it cant find the main class client. The client with the run that has "-Xmx300m JFrame" in it. I get an error about Jframe How do i fix these errors? Please help :/ Im really sorry if this didn't make sense, i tried the best i could :l

item.title: Client run file always crashes? Help Please!
item.dc:creator: @Decysp Decysp
item.description:
@Decysp wrote:

Hi! So i’ve been experiencing alot of trouble lately with ANY 317/474 client i try to run.

Ever client i try to run, i always get a error that somewhat reads:

Error: Could not find or load main class *****.

I have over 4 client files that i downloaded, trying to figure out why they wont run…

And i get the same answer for all of them.

All of the run.bat files have this in them:

@echo off title Client "C:\Program Files\Java\jdk1.7.0_25\bin\java.exe" -Xmx750m client 30 0 lowmem members 32 pause

But with with different errors… This is so hard to explain…

So the client with the run that has “Xmx750m client” in it. I get an error where it cant find the main class client.

The client with the run that has “-Xmx300m JFrame” in it. I get an error about Jframe

How do i fix these errors? Please help

Im really sorry if this didn’t make sense, i tried the best i could :l

Read full topic
